Email Conversation Export
=========================
Export Date: 2025-09-26 11:46:00
Folder: CWFDD0O - updates on generative ai for everyone e-learning
Message Count: 1

--------------------------------------------------
ID: CWFDD0O_00
From: Nasser Alblooshi <Nasser.Alblooshi@chalhoub.com>
To: 
CC: Sabitha Menon <Sabitha.Menon@chalhoub.com>
BCC: 
Date: 2025-02-10 10:47
Subject: Updates on Generative AI For Everyone E-learning
--------------------------------------------------
Dear All, 

 

Hope you are well.

 

As you are aware we deployed our GEN AI Learning Strategy, Phase 1 on 11 NOV 2024, with the deployment of our AI Central (learning hub for AI) and “Generative AI for Everyone” e-Learning <https://chalhoubuniversity.com/course/view.php?id=3339&section=1> . 

 

The objectives of this course are:

1.	Levelling the ground and aligning our colleagues on the terms and notions of AI
2.	Demystifying AI and creating global awareness on how it can benefit our teams and business
3.	Creating awareness on the impact of AI on Community and Ethics. 

 

Our ambition (of course, with your support and sponsorship) is to achieve 75% completion across the Group by end of Q1. We understand that while our employees in various roles, functions and businesses will have varying levels of impact or connection to AI, it’s important that ALL of our teams have solid and aligned foundation, as well as remain committed to Ethical use of AI while protecting the Group privacy. This makes the course not a choice but a necessity that we, as leaders must embrace.
